name: Battlehammer Dwarf

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
text: The dwarf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
text: The dwarf has advantage on saving throws against poison and resistance against poison damage.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The dwarf makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Handaxe
text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 3 (1d6 + 0) piercing damage.

action.name: Light Crossbow
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, ranged 80/320 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden p. 107
